name: The Invasion (itch)
description:
A  2D platformer created for the Kenney Jam 2018. The player traverses through different levels in time to defeat monsters invading Earth, who appear through portals which appear throughout history.

Gameplay

Inspired by classic platformers from the past.

Navigate to the end of the level defeating monsters as you go.

This game is currently a work in progress - with three levels currently playable.

Controls

Left Arrow - Move Left,

Right Arrow - Move Right,

Space Bar - Jump and Double Jump

Future Features

More levels for the player to travel through,

Wider variety of enemies,

Introduction of other objects which can harm the player,

Introduction of music and sound effects.

Download for MacOS and Windows now available.
